DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 study will be a multicenter, double-blind, randomized, active-comparator study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of tranilast in combination with allopurinol in patients with hyperuricemia and moderate to severe gout.
DOC.brief_title: Tranilast Plus Allopurinol in Patients With Moderate to Severe Gout (TAnGO)
